name: Date a Devil!
description:
Are you lonely? Looking for a date? Tired of humans and their disgusting natures?

Try dating a devil!

Hi! I'm Roerdo the 13th.  A young devil with many charms ;). I guarantee you will enjoy your night! Just don't press too many stuff.  I don't like my belongings touched by other people. 

It is not as if those objects can open up a magic door or something! Haha.

Anyways we have 3 endings and you can complete them all in like 15 minutes~

So don't bother finding any secrets! There is nothing suspicious here!

I'll be expecting you then, see you~

Your devil, Roerdo.

Music by: Prod. Riddiman - https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCdSuKogXJOZld5Dzw_9285w
